Sentencas: A vapour absorption refrigeration system (VARS) coupled with a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is proposed for different types of refrigerated trucks (large, medium and small) as a favourable alternative to conventional diesel engine driven vapour compression refrigeration systems.
Titulo: Comparative study of solid oxide fuel cell coupled absorption refrigeration system for green and sustainable refrigerated transportation

Sentencas: An SOFC-supported VARS has the novel attributes of negligible environmental impact and the ability to keep the refrigeration system running while the vehicle engine is switched off.
Titulo: Comparative study of solid oxide fuel cell coupled absorption refrigeration system for green and sustainable refrigerated transportation

Sentencas: In addition, the SOFC system produces electricity which can be utilised for other operations on the vehicle.
Titulo: Comparative study of solid oxide fuel cell coupled absorption refrigeration system for green and sustainable refrigerated transportation

Sentencas: This in turn reduces the load on the main diesel engine of the vehicle.
Titulo: Comparative study of solid oxide fuel cell coupled absorption refrigeration system for green and sustainable refrigerated transportation

Sentencas: This research paper presents a comprehensive thermo-economic study for two different SOFC system configurations namely; series and parallel to optimise the SOFC sub-system layout.
Titulo: Comparative study of solid oxide fuel cell coupled absorption refrigeration system for green and sustainable refrigerated transportation

Sentencas: Moreover, a benefit function to optimise the SOFC stack size and operating conditions has been identified considering four performance parameters, namely; thermodynamic efficiency, mass of the system, greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions, and cost of cogeneration.
Titulo: Comparative study of solid oxide fuel cell coupled absorption refrigeration system for green and sustainable refrigerated transportation

Sentencas: The analysis was conducted on various categories of refrigerated trucks.
Titulo: Comparative study of solid oxide fuel cell coupled absorption refrigeration system for green and sustainable refrigerated transportation

Sentencas: The results show that a parallel configuration has an enhanced thermo-economic performance and requires a 45-65% lower number of SOFC cells to obtain the required refrigeration load in comparison to the series configuration.
Titulo: Comparative study of solid oxide fuel cell coupled absorption refrigeration system for green and sustainable refrigerated transportation

Sentencas: Simulation results indicated that the proposed SOFC-VARS for large, medium and small refrigerated trucks can provide an output of 3.3 kW, 12.8 kW and 18.7 kW of electric power and 1 kW, 4 kW and 6 kW of refrigeration load respectively.
Titulo: Comparative study of solid oxide fuel cell coupled absorption refrigeration system for green and sustainable refrigerated transportation

Sentencas: It was also found that the SOFC-coupled VARS is able to supply the required refrigeration load with negligible emissions of GHGs compared to other refrigerated transportation technologies.
Titulo: Comparative study of solid oxide fuel cell coupled absorption refrigeration system for green and sustainable refrigerated transportation
